changelog: bugfixes for ER and some other logic issues
fixed:
- paradox cave pathing got more granular to fix some pathing issues to some exits and within
- some locations where missplaced
- updated the settings pop-up
- made auto fill settings moire granular. explanaitions will be added later
- made vanilla bosses also reflect on the icons in the bottom instead of showing just the ?
added:
- hint glowing on locations. Locations get a slight glow around them when the have a hint associated with them and remove it when hint is collected.
- full auto ER tracking (if entrances are too close to each other they might cause issues with which entrances is linked to which exit)
More or less a hotfix for various bugs in 0.3.0
fixed:
- fix auto tabbing not working because of restructure of map layouts
- fix aga1 not being tracked properly via SNEs memory watch
- hopefully fully fix bombless start issue with bombcounts (probably not fully fixed)
- fixed logic/pathing for paradox cave
- fix HC first key guard being available without a means to kill him in inverted
- fixed swamp palace being available without being able to pull the lever in dam in inverted
- fixed switched up rooms in Mire caves map (fairy and hint where swapped in the caves map)
- fixed TR eye bridge access and showing checks available accordingly for inverted
added:
- added more checks for intractability in light and dark world. use mainly for ER
- dynamically mark entrances as green (reachable) or red (unreachable) basend an your current available wolrd-graph
- added preparations for auto ER tracking based in ingame coords and room numbers
- added mirror logic from pyramid <-> HC top access for their respective use cases
# BIG NEWS
Entrance Randomization is now track-able via the Entrances Tab and enabling 'simple' or 'full' ER in the Settings Pop-Up

- added custom LuaItems for taking care of tracking it. **THANKS to [Mysteryem](https://github.com/Mysteryem) for giving me access to their implementation in the wind waker Pack and thus their LuaItem solution to learn from**
- created images to be displayed on every location
- created a new 'sub-map' for light- and darkworld caves and arranged them to be roughly in line with the overworld layout
- ER location can be reset manually by right clicking 1-2 times or using the full reset in the Settings Pop-Up
## to-do for ER
- create logic to make only reachable entrances be green and the rest red to make it easier to see where you can go etc.
## fixed
- fixes a bunch of locations that should have been blue (scout-able) at various stages throughout your run not being blue. these include:
- Lumberjacks Tree
- Lost woods hideout (only with ER)
- Lake Hylia Item
- Spec Rock outside
- Spec Rock inside (only with ER)
- floating island
- also fixed the tablets and pedestal showing as scout-able without the book.
- Swamp palace showed its first chest being available without mirror in the detailed map view. this should not have been the case and is now displaying properly, even according to ER being on or not
- GT Firesneak room was accessible without hookshot but only boots. thats wrong and is now fixed to require hookshot.
- missed that flippers and hookshot are a viable way to reach east darkworld from pyramid without the need of gloves or hammer
## hopefull fixed but not tested
- Tracking Aga1 defeat via SNI connection and its memory address
- go mode function was faulty. might now even work and light up the go mode icon if everything is set correctly (dungeon rewards are still manually set)
- SNES offline tracking issues:
- Desert Palace Torch was not tracked correct via memory-address
- GT Torch was not tracked correct via memory-address
- GT Big Chest was not tracked correct via memory-address
- Location names got changed in a previous update but he SNES only variant was not updated. thats now fixed:
- Spec Rock outside and inside
- Hookshot Cave the 3 true hoohshot-only chests
- fixed typo in setting "include witchhut"
- fixed a wrong connection causing a possible way from pod-area/dark icerod area big bombshop etc with only flippers
- capacity fairy now is not tied to "shopsanity" but "shop_shuffle_capacity"

- made dungeon key logic somewhat live-adjusting. to more accurately show whats currently in logic and what not. (TR currently only vanilla routing implemented inverted and glitched coming from the other entrances comes next)
- manually updating/clicking off locations now instantly forces a logic update without needing to toggle an item.
- fixed pyramid fairy inverted logic missing the mirror as requirement.
- fixed GT right only considering hookshot as way to logically pass the room but boots work too.
- changed dungeon tab ordering to be inline with order down in the key/map/compass section
to-do:
- change shop to only show the number of actual randomized slots for each shop
- fix more inverted stuff probably
- add more logic options
sometime later
- add ER
- autotrack entrances
sorry for the long wait time between this and the last update.
fixed:
- fixed a bunch of logic in inverted including:
-  bumpercave
- climbing DM
- added missing titans requirement for TR teleporter
- fixed SP only looking for flippers for the first chest but lets you go deeper without them
- fixed GT randomizer room naming/positions
- remove medallions from deal damage calculations because they miss marked stuff as beatable if you could not even use them
- adds mirror connection from digging game to maze race
- added missing bombs requirements for graveyard ledge, DM cave shop and the 2 paradox cave lower chests
- fixed marking of scoutable locations on the map to mark them properly and not as available
to-do:

- add ER

- adds single capacity upgrade introduced in 0.4.5 that got missed
- fixed connection issue from pod area to big bomb shop area
- fixed some inverted connetors missing such as desert->mire area or dark DM stairs
- removed duplicate medallio mapping
- fixed misspelling of AP in the pack name
- internal functions overhaul of some sort....neds to be done further
- fixed catfish needing titans instead of power gloves
- fixed paradox cave nameing and rules
- fixes SP key requirements for after second trench
- added new rules system to rescue dwarf
- Thanks to Black Sliver a first verison of logic-resolution-fix is in here.
- nothing else but this. but should fix the locations turning red randomly issue
- fixed checks turning red when certain items where collected
- fixed universal keys image missing
- combined connection handling for almost every option. so no more 2 files for <=0.4.4 and 0.4.5.
- whichhut and capacity upgrade ar to toggle manually
- changes default option for 'startMode' from 'standard' to 'open'
- hopefully added better handling for bunny walking state
- hopefully added universal keys support
- changed autotracking mapping to default to 0.4.5 options
- fixed multiple missen access rules
- added forgotten IP logic
- added a check to almost every location that checks for bunny access. for after defeating aga1 without moonpearl, swim stuff might be not correct
- added missed RETRO CAVES setting to popup
- fixed pyramid fairy access
- major internal rework
- prepared the pack for future ER compatability
- moved most of the option into the settings popup to clean up the UI
- added a setting for AUTO-TAB switching from Overworld to Dungeon and back...horizontal layout can be bugged for that
- fixed many wrongly designed acces rules

Many thanks to Ishigh1 and Keseph for the help
- hotfix for 0.1.2:
- fixed medallions nit being tracked and typo accessrule for EP in the overworld
- clean up
- mostly fixes regarding keydrop shuffle and access_rules. specific changes should be listed here https://github.com/StripesOO7/alttp-ap-poptracker-pack/compare/v0.1.1...v0.1.2)
- hopefully fixed a bug where normal bow whould be displayed as silvers
- changed shop_sanity to activate with the right option. hopefully keydrop shuffle is also auto enabled (not tested)
- fixed mixed up tracking of MM big chest and Map chest in SNES Tracking
- fixed typo in Zoras Domain + others
- fixed access rules for Darkworld left-side when only having hookshot and right-side Darkworld access
- fixed broken settings-autofill because of the smallkey-settings change from v0.1...it crashed when encountering the smallkey_shuffle option and did not track anything after that
- fixed Medallions changing state when reconnecting without reset or just toggeling the autofill-setting on and off
- split Dark- and Lightworld Maps into their own tabs for vertical view, so images are bigger
- added marking MM and TR as available when having all 3 Medallions but not having them marked
- added Keydropshuffle as option to select and adjusted the Key-requiremts accordingly
- split small+big key icon as well as map+compass icon into separat toggles
- added universal keys as option to select (indicated wit a 'u' next to the small-key settings-icon
- non-progressive items should get tracked properly
- added 'retro caves' to the map --> they need to be marked of manually
(retro caves as option is in the settings popup next to settings-autofill)
- fixed typos for some locations and accesrules
- fixed access rule for specrock item --> does not need moon pearl in inverted
- fixed wrong changing of state for medallions when only reconnecting to AP with autofill on and without reset
- fixed swapped PoD arena bridge and ledge chest tracking for SNES-tracking
- nice
- logic fixed for Desert Palace Backentrance access
- corrected name of 'Magic Bat' check
- bunch of small changes to account for the duplicate smallkeys with and without _drop in the name
- removed the keydrop variants becuase got to work within one variant. only distinction again is the connection method
- layout change now works and changes when keydropshuffle is de-/actived
- fixed Spwam Palace Logic, Hammer was not considered needed in inverted glitchless setting
- changed rules for purple chests access but not really tested.
-keydrop_shuffle should already work
- mostly logic fixes
- settings auto-tracking can now be enabled without reconnecting the tracker.
- Split into multiple variants to avoid interferane of AP and SNES scripts while tracking. When AP variants are choosen the SNES will be visible but the script does not get loaded!!!
- STIL NO autrotracking of settings in SNES variants
- multiple logic fixes for all modi
- improvements to SNES 'offline' Tracking
- added the possiblity to track key under pots or dropped from enemies. But ONLY via SNES interface!!
- keydrop locations can be made visible in the AP variants but are NOT marked of automatically!!!
- added a small sleep timer for SNES script to prevent location/item overrides on save&quit. DOWNSIDE is that the script may load and 'hang' for 2-3 at first -/reconnects
- added MINOR and OVERWORLD glitched logic. some things/tricks may be missing. please report them
- current glichtes are: waterwalk, fakeflipper, hera-pot, hammerless swamp, ice place mirror warp, hera/gt screen wrap, corner/slope clips
- NEITHER ice breaker nor IP bombjump are implemented into IP logic
- Bunny rivivals are NOT concidered 'in Logic'
- Spike Cave checks for hearthcount or availability of bottles and 'cane of byrna' or 'magic cape' including potions or fairies....14+ hearts is the threshold
- TR access and internal logic is stil WIP and may missreport availability or lack there off
- Flute is now considered ACTIVE uppon receiving
- improvements to inverted logic
- improvements to SNES 'offline' Tracking
- improvements to inverted logic
- SNES 'offline' Tracking support
- inverted logic fixes
- improved inverted logic
- auto fetching of medelion enabled (setting to turn off will come later)
- fixed purple chest availability (initial idea did not work)
- fixed heartpiece display count
- fixed spike cave availability, (added hammer need)
- fixed swamp palace (missed mirror for one rule)
